title: Free premium cable TV, Jacuzzi available for tenants, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Boulder II Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Laundry facilities', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Jacuzzi available for tenants', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-No long term lease required', '-Easy freeway access', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Basketball hoops', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
